A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Answers to all the questions you had after you see Force Awakens are either completely omitted or are not satisfying. You can really see that the new director had no idea how to properly follow what Force Awakens built and it seems he has no grasp over the lore of Star Wars. And I say this as a person who doesn't care that much about this franchise\, but have watched all the movies.
